summary: I've always wanted a vampire armor with eastern traits, and since the much requested Dracula Untold armour hasn't been created yet, i think this could do for now
descriptionHtml:
[b][center][size=6]Drakan Armor 
[/size][size=4]A Samurai/Vampiric armor[/size][/center][/b]

In many movies, comics, anime, etc. dracula is often wearing a nice armor with samurai or eastern traits, as a "Dracul", a dragon, it tottaly makes sense.
I've always wanted something like this, there are already a few heavy vampire armor sets here on the nexus but none would satisfy me.

So i created this, using meshes from zyuu's Samurai Blades Armor, and textures from Prime's Blades Samurai Armour and Kimonos, with a dark, vampiric touch.
This is my first skyrim mod, and i know it isn't anything great but hopefully this will make more talented modders create a better armor inspired in my concept.

The armor is located in a chest in Mara's Eye Pond (vampire lair), its stats are between ebony and dragonplate, but much more lighter.
It looks like a reinforced blades armour, and the helmet is replaced by a cowl which i seemed more fitting. It uses the default nightingale textures.
It can be tempered with the arcane blacksmith perk with ebony ingots and human hearts.
A female version is also included.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=3][u][b]Installation[/b][/u][/size]

Install like any other armor mod, using your favourite mod manager
Manual installation: copy the files to your skyrim data folder

[size=3][u][b]Uninstallation[/b]

[/u][/size]Just delete the contents of this mod

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=3][b][u]Requirements

[/u][/b][/size]Only the latest Skyrim update

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=3][u][b]Known bugs[/b]
[/u][/size]
The meshes are a modified version of zyuu's Blades armor
The textures are a modified version of Prime's "nuinobe" armor, using the default game blade armor speculars
 
Any bug related to these please refer to it's original autors

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[size=3][b][u]Credits[/u][/b][/size]
[b]
[/b]Textures - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24704/?]Blades Samurai Armour and Kimonos[/url] by [b]Prime - Full permission[/b]
Meshes - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7618/?]Samurai Blades Armor[/url] by [b]Zyuu - I couldn't contact Zyuu, but since he is probably an unactive user, and his mod's permissions states that it can be used asking first for his permission, i don't think he has any problems with this. IF he does have i will sadly remove this mod.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[/b][size=3][b][u]
Recommended mods[/u][/b][/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9717/?]Better Vampires[/url] by [b]Brehani[/b]n - Simply the best vampire overhaul out there
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69792/?]Vampires Fight With Claws[/url] by [b]wgperi[/b] - A hidden gem, gives some nice claws to your vampire
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31229/?]Medusa Drakul armors and Thanatos dragon[/url] by [b]Zerofrost[/b] - The great Drakul armor, dark, vampiric and awesome
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71177/?]Heretic Armor Set[/url] by [b]Ignus[/b] - An awesome heavy vampire armor, worth checking out
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50459/?]Warmonger Armory[/url] by [b]Batmanna[/b] - Contains some more nice vampire armor sets, aswell as some other themed armour
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72581/?]Illustrious HDT Cloaks of Skyrim[/url] by[b] EuphoricKnave[/b] - Some cool HDT enabled capes, based on the Cloaks of Skyrim mod, as shown on some screenshots
[b]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/b]
[b][u][size=3]
Some questions you might have[/size][/u][/b]

Q: ENB used on the screenshots?
A: ICBINE 3 + imaginator

Q: Why it isn't working for me? 
A: You didn't installed it properly, this is just an armour mod so its nothing complex

Q: Is it lore friendly?
A: As an armor Dracula would wear, being him "the dragon" and the vampire, it could totally be lore- friendly

Q: Can you add/modify X,Y,Z?
A: No, this will be the final version and as i stated, it is mostly made to inspire more talented modders

Q: You just took someone else's work and put it together
A: Mostly yes, i did some tweaks though. If you have a problem with this read the previous answer

Q: The name sounds familiar...
A: Yes, i took it from a RuneScape character, an equivalent of Dracula. It just sounds more evil to me
[b]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/b]

As a final note i would like to thank the awsome nexus modding community for being the best one, and thank once more the original authors of this mod.
Again, this is my first skyrim mod and i hope you all enjoy it.
And sorry for my english if its bad, it isn't my first language.
author: Ihhman
